com.pathfindersdk.bonus

Class Bonus

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.pathfindersdk.bonus.Bonus
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<Bonus>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbilityBonus

    public class Bonus
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<Bonus>
    This generic class applies a bonus to a Stat object. Bonus types don't stack except for UNTYPED, the biggest bonus is always considered, circumstantial bonus are not added to total.
